description: Outback MAX display slow to boot or freezing
recommended_action: Update firmware - check power supply for voltage drops - factory reset if needed

description: A321 Atlas corrections slow convergence time
recommended_action: Allow 15-20 min convergence - verify Atlas subscription active - check antenna sky view

description: A222 SBAS guidance drifting more than expected
recommended_action: Normal for SBAS level - reset A-B line periodically - upgrade to Atlas for better accuracy

description: eDriveX steering hunting side-to-side on straight runs
recommended_action: Reduce steering aggressiveness parameter - check hydraulic response - recalibrate

description: eDriveX not engaging - error code on display
recommended_action: Check hydraulic connections - verify correct valve kit for tractor - inspect wiring harness

description: eDriveTC motor slipping or buzzing without turning
recommended_action: Retorque column clamp - inspect motor friction wheel - verify correct steering adapter
Check L-band antenna placement (clear south sky view) - verify subscription - recycle receiver

description: Outback section control valves not actuating
recommended_action: Check valve wiring connections - verify valve driver output - test valves with direct power

description: Outback rate control overshooting target rate
recommended_action: Recalibrate flow meter - check servo valve response time - adjust PID control parameters
Verify WiFi connection - check account login credentials - reduce file size if large field
